Container.Name: muximux
Container.Overview: Muximux(https://github.com/mescon/Muximux) is a lightweight portal to view and manage your HTPC apps without having to run anything more than a PHP enabled webserver. With Muximux you don't need to keep multiple tabs open, or bookmark the URL to all of your apps.
Container.Changes:
### 2021-01-23 - Rebasing to alpine 3.13.
### 2020-06-01 - Rebasing to alpine 3.12.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-02-22 - Rebasing to alpine 3.9.
### 2019-01-16 - Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
### 2018-09-13 - Rebase to alpine 3.8.
### 2018-01-09 - Rebase to alpine 3.7.
### 2017-05-25 - Rebase to alpine 3.6.
### 2017-02-12 - Rebase to alpine 3.5.
### 2016-10-14 - Add version layer information.
### 2016-09-30 - Rebase to alpine linux.
### 2016-09-09 - Add badges to README.
### 2016-02-22 - Initial release date.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Where muximux should store its files.
